sentences.translation: 同样是不可知论者，我相信。

sentences.sentence: True, there are plenty of agnostics in the foxholes of solitude;
sentences.translation: 在孤独的散兵坑里确实有许多不可知论者；

sentences.sentence: He said the agnostics were also demanding a "more even-handed" bibliography.
sentences.translation: 他说不可知论者也要求一个“更加公平的”书目。
